auth.toggleSignUp: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.toggleSignIn: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.privacyConsent: I agree to the processing of personal data
auth.verificationFailedMessage: The entered employer name and employee ID do not match our records. Please check your data and try again.

emailNotConfirmed.title: Email not verified
emailNotConfirmed.message: Your email {email} is not yet verified.
emailNotConfirmed.instruction: Check your email inbox and click on the verification link.

userExists.title: Account already exists
userExists.message: An account with email {email} already exists.
userExists.instruction: Try signing in or resending the verification email.
